content:
Announcing SUSHI 2.2.3 with the following bug fixes:

  • Remove incorrect warnings about unused soft indices in rules
  • Correctly handle mixed case dependencies extracted from the IG resource

These bugs were introduced in version 2.2.2. That first bug was rather embarrassing. Sorry about that. Thanks for your patience!

To install or update to this release, run the following command:

$ npm install -g fsh-sushi

For more information, see the SUSHI 2.2.3 Release Notes.
